description:
Kazuki overhears Hino muttering about Yunoki and her, and he automatically thinks they are going to get married. However, in actually, Yunoki told Kahoko about a fiance "candidate", Ayano, and how she was being too persistent in chasing after him. Meanwhile, Kazuki tells everyone in the concourse, with the exception of Shoko, about what he heard...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Capriccio for a Young Girl`s Heart
